title: i am level 16 but it won't let post anywhere but here!

replies.body: Your account looks to be sync'd on the boards so you should be able to post fine.  Let me know if this is still an issue!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1ya8j2QV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-03T23:10:28.303+0000)
>
> Your account looks to be sync'd on the boards so you should be able to post fine.  Let me know if this is still an issue!

It is fixed now. Thanks! I think it got fixed an hour or two after I originally posted this. <3
